attributes.action: Take action against Romania for the way it fails to manage its stray dog issue
attributes.background: A country of the EU is allowed to treat its animals so inhumanely. So many investigative reports written, so many petitions raised but still it continues. We must take action to stop this mass cruelty. MK Gandhi, “The greatness of a nation can be judged by the way its animals are treated”.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could as the UK Government to raise this issue with the government of Romania.
